title: Include CMake projects from Github!
snippet: When I develop a CMake based project I often want to include other CMake projects into mine. Gladly CMake offers a quick and easy way on how to automatically pull the other project from Github, build it using its own CMakeLists.txt and make the results available to my own project.CMakeList.txt.in...

title: Writing an About page!
snippet: The first impression looks to be the most important one. Thats what the Aboutpage is for.At some point in future I will update my About page following the guide of Tracie Forbes.

title: Automated Camera Stabilization and Calibration for Intelligent Transportation Systems
snippet: Within the PROVIDENTIA++ project, a section of the highway A9 between Munich and Nuremberg was converted to a testing site for autonomous driving.
